message_2:
First, we will substitute the value of x into the expression:

3(2(4) + 5) - 4(3(4) - 2)

Now, we will perform the operations inside the parentheses:

3(8 + 5) - 4(12 - 2)

Next, we will perform the addition and subtraction inside the parentheses:

3(13) - 4(10)

Now, we will perform the multiplication:

39 - 40

Finally, we will perform the subtraction:

39 - 40 = -1

So, the expression evaluates to -1 when x = 4.
